text: Big Book may refer to: * Big Book (award), a Russian literary award for best prose in Russian * Big Book (thought experiment), involving ethics developed by Ludwig Wittgenstein * The Big Book (Alcoholics Anonymous) * The Big Book Of, a series of graphic novel anthologies published by the DC Comics imprint Paradox Press. * The Big Read, a 2003 survey carried out by the BBC, with the goal of finding the "Nation's Best-loved Book" by way of a viewer vote via the Web, SMS and telephone
title: Big Book
